mapper.insert: MERGE INTO B_S_0060201 b1 USING (SELECT #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS ID, #{cjjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CJJLDH, #{fxjlgljlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS FXJLGLJLID, #{fxjldid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS FXJLDID, #{zsIs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AS ZSIS, #{zsBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS ZSBZ, #{cxZjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CXZJQDID, #{cxBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CXBZ, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS BZ, #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS WHDWID, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS WHRID, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AS WHSJ, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AS ZT, #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AS TBBS, #{zsWckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS ZSWCKCID, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS DPRTCODE, #{cxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS CXJLDH FROM dual) b2 ON ( b1.ID=b2.ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ZS_IS = #{zsIs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ZS_BZ = #{zsBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CX_ZJQDID = #{cxZjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CX_BZ = #{cxBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHDWID = #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHRID = #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WHSJ = #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TBBS = #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CX_JLDH = #{cxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZS_WCKCID = #{zsWckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ID, CJJLDH, FXJLGLJLID, FXJLDID, ZS_IS, ZS_BZ, CX_ZJQDID, CX_BZ, BZ, WHDWID, WHRID, WHSJ, ZT, TBBS, DPRTCODE, ZS_WCKCID,CX_JLDH) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cjjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxjlgljlid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fxjldid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zsIs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zsBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cxZjqdid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cxBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whdwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{whsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tbbs,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zsWckcid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cxjldh,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
